description:
With all the rainy weather lately, Chi-chan can`t dry his pants, and his last pair is blown away by the wind. He tries using the PriPri Shot to order something that`ll help him get his pants back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nin, Nin! I Have to Get My Pants Back!
ニンニン! パンツをとりもどせでち!
